what a mood honestly. i swear to god if they buff yasuo or akali or something along those lines in the next patch, im uninstalling. 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

I hardly play this game but when I used to, Darius is actually pretty weak until he heals up with that Q....

Honestly, I'm fine with the changes if they reduce that heal. He shouldn't be able to heal so much hitpoints it just makes it bullshit. Get him down to 200hp and then it takes 1 person to get hit by his q and boom, magically has 500-600hp.
his heal is so powerful i dont even get it. bloody 5v1 and darius can just one shot
Kha'zix getting a buff as well as a skin??? :thinking:
im questioning life

pls riot darius and fiora r already to strong dont buff them.

i auto ban darius every game
Just stun me kha just put me to sleep I rather die than get a 90% reduced movement

somebody knows why cant i forge the golden chroma of champion tresh even i have got the original skin. The client only ask me to check the service statue and restart, i have done it many times but it does not work also. if someone know plz plz plz tell me what happened.
Do you have 400 tokens? The error is still unusual, but if you don't have the 400 tokens that would explain why it's not working.
i have 400 token but it does not work also.......

Hmm, I'd recommend submitting a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They should be able to help/point you in the right direction, and if it's some sort of bug that's going to affect more people the sooner they know the sooner it can be fixed.
can you guys please nerf irelia… her dash can one hit heimerdingers turrets at level 1 and she is able to recast it rapidly... that's not fair.

Nice, buff a bunch of champions that have been dominating low-tier play unchecked for ages. Pyke has been brutal since release often outperforming his adc with his ult being a prime reason, J4 can be traumatically strong in jungle I tend to associate his presence with early turret dives and invading and now you buff his clear speed, and Darius is literally in 8 out of 10 of all my games BEFORE this buff.

Interest in game at critical levels. {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

So its perfectly okay to buff the monsters of top lane such as fiora and darius who, lets be honest here DID NOT need the buffs. even buffing kha is a bad choice. why is there no buffs to the champs who need it to go against these monsters. For example yorick can't do anything since his nerf and most certainly is more useless against the top laners now. riot pls buff those who actually need it like the so called dominant pick yorick you guys said yourself he was. since his rework i have seen him played less than 30 times total and that was a few years ago. actaully buff those who need it and nerf the monsters like darius, fiora, akali, kaisa and graves. dont care if its worlds soon they deserves a nerf just cause u want them played in the tournaments doesnt give justification for them to be buffed like this.
